bibl.title: A Collection of chreiai: P.Mich. inv. 41 Revisited.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: New readings in P. Mich. Inv. 41 (= M.-P.3 1988.1; LDAB 341) suggest that the fragment has transmitted a catalogue of chreiai attributed to different well-known people. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Cristina Iturralde Mauleón, A Collection of chreiai: P.Mich. inv. 41 Revisited.
New readings in P. Mich. Inv. 41 (= M.-P.3 1988.1; LDAB 341) suggest that the fragment has transmitted a catalogue of chreiai attributed to different well-known people. - Avec résumé en anglais.
